items.title: Indian fighter jet pilot killed in crash at Dubai airshow
items.description: A court inquiry is being carried out to assess the cause of the crash.

items.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
items.description: Security forces have launched operations to assess the situation and locate the missing pupils.

items.title: England fight back as 19 wickets fall on incredible Ashes first day
items.description: Captain Ben Stokes took five wickets as England's fast bowlers sensationally tore into Australia on an electrifying opening day of the Ashes.

items.title: Gove apologises after Covid report alleges 'toxic' culture in No 10 during pandemic
items.description: The ex-senior minister apologises for mistakes in the pandemic, but defends some of the previous government's actions.

items.title: UK expected to approve plans for Chinese mega embassy
items.description: A final decision has not yet been formally taken but the controversial project is expected to be given the go-ahead.
